reviews.review: fav fps game since 2015, not even clones that steal the afterplant and retake gamemodes cant be better than this og game from 1999, its like ruining everything that works about the game and calling it your game, like thats so lame, i hope valorant dies and cs comes back to its prime like it deserves.
